Please choose correct answer
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-question-list-view', templateUrl: './userTakeTestView.html', styleUrls: ['./userTakeTestView.css'] }) export class UserTakeTestView implements OnInit { startTest:boolean = false; currentQuestion:any = null; currentQuestionIndex:number = -1; questionList:any = []; selectedAnswers: string[] = []; correctAnswers:number = 0; setId:number = -1; // Timer var remainingTime: number = 20 * 60; // 20 minutes in seconds timerInterval: any; minutes: number = 0; seconds: number = 0; constructor(private router:ActivatedRoute ) { let question = {questionId:1, question:"Char* string = 'Hello world';\nprintf(\"%d\", sizeof(string))", answers:['A. 4', 'B. 8', 'C. 2', 'D. I don\'t known'], correctAnswer:['D. I don\'t known']} let question1 = {questionId:1, question:"How many data type are there in JavaScript)", answers:['A. 4', 'B. 8', 'C. 2', 'D. I don\'t known'], correctAnswer:['D. I don\'t known']} this.questionList = [question,question1,question,question1] ; } ngOnInit(): void { this.setId = this.router.snapshot.params['tid']; } startButton() { this.startTest = true; this.currentQuestionIndex = 1; this.currentQuestion = this.questionList[0]; } nextButton() { this.currentQuestionIndex++; if(this.currentQuestionIndex >= this.questionList.length) { this.currentQuestionIndex = this.questionList.length - 1; } this.currentQuestion = this.questionList[this.currentQuestionIndex]; } previousButton() { this.currentQuestionIndex--; if(this.currentQuestionIndex <= -1) { this.currentQuestionIndex = 0; } this.currentQuestion = this.questionList[this.currentQuestionIndex]; } captureAnswer(event: any, questionIndex: number) { this.selectedAnswers[questionIndex] = event.target.value; } checkAnswer() { for(let i = 0; i <= this.questionList.length; i++) { if(this.questionList[i] == this.selectedAnswers[i]) { this.correctAnswers++; } } } startTimer() { this.timerInterval = setInterval(() => { if (this.remainingTime > 0) { this.remainingTime--; this.updateDisplay(); } else { clearInterval(this.timerInterval); // Logic when timer reaches 0, e.g., submit test automatically } }, 1000); } updateDisplay() { this.minutes = Math.floor(this.remainingTime / 60); this.seconds = this.remainingTime % 60; } ngOnDestroy() { clearInterval(this.timerInterval); // Clear the interval when component is destroyed } }
